docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.

docs.text: C12 ¶ Test-5 ¶ listening-1 ¶ I'd like to find out if you have any excursions suitable for families. excursion [ɪk'skɜːʃ(ə)n] 远足 suitable 这种后置修饰要注意别漏听 How about taking your family for a cruise ? We have a steamship that takes passengers out several times a day. cruise [kruːz] 巡游 steamship ['stiːmʃɪp] 轮船 passenger ['pæsɪndʒə] 旅客，这个在听力常见。 About an hour and a half. 这个听起来会很绕，注意这种时间的讲法。 fantastic 奇艺的，新奇的 there's a cafe or something on board . cafe 一般指小餐馆 on board 船上，火车上，飞机上 various 多种多样的，a variety of you are met off the boat by the farmer and he'll take you to the holding pens , where the sheep are kept . meet sb off the boat 接下船 holding pens 圈养 keep 饲养 there's also a 40-minute trek round the farm on a horse. trek 艰苦跋涉 round 跟all year round不同，这里应该是介词：绕 visitors are welcome to explore the farm on their own , as long as they take care to close gates and so on. on their own 任他们自己 as long as 只要 take care to do sth There are some very beautiful gardens along the side of the lake which also belong to the farm. along the side of 沿着xx的一面（边） what‘s the trail like in terms of difficulty? trail [treɪl] （注意读音）小径 in terms of 在...方面 work out 解决 It's just by the cruise ship terminal. by 附近，旁边 You'd also need to pick up a repair kit for the bike from there to take along with you, and you'd need to take along a snack and some water. repair kit 修理工具包 snack [snæk] 小吃，快餐。 Shaxian snack哈哈 I assume I can rent a helmet from the bike place. helmet ['helmɪt] 头盔 you should definitely get that. definitely ['defɪnɪtlɪ] 当然地。口语时省略读te, 就像definely what sort of prices are we looking at here? look at 这里是考虑之意 listening-2 ¶ they might get shouted at sometimes, but it's nothing personal. (没听懂的句子)虽然他们有时大喊大叫，但是这不是针对个人。 they're pleased that they have so many different things to do. pleased 高兴的 I'll tell you straightaway that .. straightaway 通俗易懂 straightforward you've all shown up on time. show up 露面，到场 I'm glad to see that ... glad 高兴的 the floor can get very wet and slippery . wet [wet] 湿的 slippery ['slɪp(ə)rɪ] 滑的。slip v.滑 Some of you'll need to remove your rings and bracelets . ring 戒指 bracelet [ˈbreɪslət] 手链 jewelry ['dʒuːəlrɪ] 珠宝 （题目粗线的） hazard ['hæzəd] 危险 regulation [regjʊ'leɪʃ(ə)n] 规则。 reputation 名声 There's some equipment you mustn't use until you've been properly trained, like the waste disposal system for example. equipment 设备 properly 适当地。proper适当的，appropriate 适当的 waste disposal system 废物处理系统 the meat sheer is out of bounds . meat sheer 至今不知道是啥，绞肉机？ out of bound 越界的 electric mixer 电动搅拌机。 electric 用电的 electrical 与电有关的 electronic 电子的 stressful 有压力的 plessure 愉快 pressure 压力 do overtime 加班 lifting and carrying 搬和运 but at least we do have a very efficient air conditioning system compared with some kitchens. efficient [ɪ'fɪʃ(ə)nt] 有效的（注意读音） air conditioning system 空调系统 If you injure yourself at all, even if it's really minor , you must report to him and he'll make sure the incident is recorded and you get the appropriate treatment . minor ['maɪnə] 较小的 incident 事件 appropriate[əˈprəʊprɪət;(for v.)əˈprəʊprɪeɪt] 适当地 treatment 治疗，处理，对待 smash a plate [smæʃ] 打碎盘子 the stores of perishable 易腐产品的贮藏 perish ['perɪʃ] 死亡，腐烂 flour or sugar 面粉 或 糖 flour ['flaʊə] 跟flower一样读音 listening-3 ¶ external development external [ɪk'stɜːn(ə)l; ek-] 外部的，表面的 local population 地方群体 the source of funding funding 资金 brainstorm a few ideas brainstorm ['breɪnstɔːm] 集思广益（头脑风暴） lots of books have been digitalised , people can access them from their own computers. If everyone did that, libraries would be obsolete . digitalise 使数字化 access ['ækses] 访问 obsolete ['ɒbsəliːt] adj.淘汰的， vt.淘汰 Digitalised books that are available online for free are mostly out of copyright . available [ə'veɪləb(ə)l] 可获得的 out of copyright 没有版权 up-to-date & out-of-date 最新的 & 过期的 evolve [ɪ'vɒlv] v.发展。evolution financial implication 涉及财政。implication 含义，牵连。 work out 又粗线了 we could interview some of the staff , and find out whether the library has its own budget . or if that's controlled by the local council . interview 采访 staff 职员 budget ['bʌdʒɪt] 预算 council ['kaʊns(ə)l; -sɪl] 委员会 facility for staff facility [fə'sɪləti] 设施。equipment measure v.n.测量 emergency exits 紧急出口 there's the question of the kind of insurance the library needs to have, in case anyone gets injured. in case 万一 they've got an archive of local newspapers going back years. archive ['ɑrkaɪv] 档案 going back years 前几年发行？ diary diary ['daɪərɪ] 日记。dairy ['deərɪ] 奶制品的 I quite fancy finding out what the differences ... fancy ['fænsɪ] v.喜爱，想象 adj.奇特的 listening-4 ¶ In public discussion of busness, we take certain values for granted . take sth for granted 认为...理所当然。grant v.同意，承认 collaboration [kəlæbə'reɪʃn] 合作 The trouble with these values. 使用with theoretical concept. 理论上的概念 pursue values by all means. pursue [pə'sjuː] 追求，从事 They can actually cause damage, which is not at all the intention . not at all 一点也不。不客气 intention [ɪn'tenʃ(ə)n] 意图 All too often the right thing backfires , if those leaders adopt values without understanding and managing the side effects that arise. The values can easily get in the way of what's actually intended. backfire 事与愿违 side effect 副作用 get in the way of 妨碍 get in xx's way On a anagement training course I once attended, once 曾经 The other teams tried to collaborate on building the structure, and descended into confusion , with everyone getting in each other's way . descend into confusion 陷入混乱 get in xx's way 妨碍 brilliantly ['briljəntli] 辉煌地 comply with the rule comply [kəm'plaɪ] 遵守，顺从 let // the person in the team with an aptitude for puzzles like this// build it alone. 注意断句let the person build it alone. with an aptitude for puzzles 有解谜题的天赋 In the case of a smartphone that a certain company launched, one director wanted to target the business market , and another demanded it was aimed at consumers. target 把目标放在 business market 企业市场 demand 要求 have his way 得逞 industriousness industrious [ɪn'dʌstrɪəs] 勤奋的 It's easy to mock people who say they work hard: after all , a hamster running around in a wheel is working hard - and getting nowhere. mock [mɒk] 嘲笑 after all 毕竟 hamster 仓鼠 wheel [wiːl] 车轮 the resources that companies value most. value vt. 重视 Here 'lazy' means having a rational determination not to carry out unnecessary tasks. rational ['ræʃ(ə)n(ə)l] 合理的 carry out 执行 这里的unnecessary 会听不怎么清un- they possess intellectual clarity , and they don't rush into making decisions. possess [pə'zes] 持有 clarity ['klærɪtɪ] 清晰 rush into 匆忙做。hurry up and [do sth] come up with 想出，提出 creat an attention-grabbing TV commercial . attention-grabbing 引人注目的。grab 抓走 commercial [kə'mɜːʃ(ə)l] 商业广告。adj.商业的，盈利的 plenty of 大量的 subsequent ['sʌbsɪkw(ə)nt] 随后的 derives pleasure from .. [dɪ'raɪv] 从xx得到快乐 profit ['prɒfɪt] 利润，利益 to solve a problem that the company has identified. 解决公司已经确认的问题 claim they "strive for excellence" 声称他们为卓越而奋斗 pioneer 先锋，拓荒者 market share 市场占有率 reading-1 ¶ Cork - the thick bark of the cork oal tree (Quercus suber) - is a remarkable material. Cork 软木。出现学名不懂也没办法 thick [θɪk] 厚的 bark [bɑːk] 树皮，毛皮 cork oal tree 软木橡树 remarkable [rɪ'mɑːkəb(ə)l] 卓越的，值得注意的。remark(评论) mark(标记) It is tough , elastic , buoyant , and fire-resistant , and suitable for a wide range of purposes. tough [tʌf] 坚韧的 elastic [ɪ'læstɪk] adj.有弹性的 n.橡皮圈 buoyant [ˈbɔɪənt] 轻快的 fire-resistant ['faɪə] [rɪ'zɪstənt] 抗火的 It has also been used for millennia : the ancient Egyptians sealed their sarcophagy (stone coffins ) with cork, while the ancient Greeks and Romans used it for anything from beehives to sandals . millennia [mɪˈleniə] 一千年 Egyptians [i:'dʒipʃənz] 埃及人 Greeks 希腊人 Romans 罗马人 seal [siːld] 封闭 coffins 棺材 beehive ['biːhaɪv] 蜂房 sandals ['sændlz] 凉鞋 And the cork oak itself is an extraordinary tree. extraordinary [ɪkˈstrɔːdənrɪ] 非凡的 Its bark grows up to 20 cm in thickness, insulating the tree like a coat wrapped around the trunk and branches and keeping the inside at a constant 20 ℃ all year round. insulate ['ɪnsjʊleɪt] 使绝缘 illustrate(说明) trunk 树干 Developed most probably as a defence against forest fires, the bar of the cork oak has a particular cellular structure - with about 40 million cells per cubic centimetre - that technology has never succeeded in replicating . 过去分词引导的句子做状语 most probably 很可能地 forest 森林 bar 棒，障碍 cellular 细胞的 centimetre ['sentɪmiːtə] 公分，厘米 (下下句里)millimetre ['mili,mi:tə] 毫米 replicate 复制 It also has an elasticity that means you can squash it and watch it spring back to its original size and shape when you release the pressure. squash 挤压 spring back 生长(spring有跳起、裂开的意思n/vi.vt) They flourish in warm, sunny climates where there is a minimum of 400 millimetres of rain per year. flourish ['flʌrɪʃ] 兴旺 climate [ˈklaɪmɪt] 气候 a minimum of 400 millimetres of rain Like grape vines , the trees thrive in poor soil , putting down deep roots in search of moisture and nutrients . grape vine 葡萄 藤 thrive [θraɪv] 兴旺，茁壮成长 (flourish) soil 土壤 moisture ['mɒɪstʃə] 水分 nutrient ['njuːtrɪənt] n.营养物，adj.营养的。nutritious有营养的，nutrition营养，营养学 in search of Today accounts for roughly half of all cork production around the world. ... are around 200 years old accounts for xx of xx 占比 around adv.大约，到处，在附近，prep.在周围 an exercise in patience 对耐心的锻炼 From the planting of a cork sapling to the first harvest takes 25 years, and a gap of approximately a decade must separate harvests from an individual tree. sapling ['sæplɪŋ] 树苗 harvest ['hɑːvɪst] 收获 separate (使)分开 If the bark is stripped on a day when it's too cold - or when the air is damp - the tree will be damaged. strip 脱去 damp 潮湿的 Cork harvesting is a very specialised profession . No mechanical means of stripping cork bark has been invented. specialised profession 特别的职业 mechanical means 机械手段 invent 发明 They make vertical cuts down the bark using small sharp axes , then lever it away in pieces as large as they can manage. vertical 垂直的 sharp axes 尖锐的斧头 lever 杠杆撬动 The most skilful cork-strippers prise away a semi-circular husk that runs the lenght of the trunk from just above ground level to the first branches. It is then dried on the ground. prise 撬动 (lever) semi-circular 半圆形的 husk [hʌsk] 皮，外壳 (bark) ground 地面 dry 使变干 It is boiled to kill any insects that might remain in the cork. boil 煮沸 insect ['ɪnsekt] 昆虫 Over 60% of cork then goes on to be made into traditional bottle stoppers , with most of the remainder being used in the construction trade. go on 继续 bottle stoppers 瓶塞 construction 建设 Corkboard and cork tiles are ideal for thermal and acoustic insulation, while granules of cork are used in the manufacture of concrete. tile 瓷砖 ideal 理想的 thermal ['θɜːm(ə)l] 热量的 acoustic [ə'kuːstɪk] 声学的 granules [grænju:ls] 颗粒 manufacture [mænjʊ'fæktʃə] 加工，制造 Recent years have seen the end of the virtual monopoly of cork as the material for bottle stoppers, due to concerns about the effect it may have on the contents of the bottle. This is caused by a chemical compound call 2,4,6-trichloroanisole (TCA), which forms through the interaction of plant phenols, chlorine and mould. virtual [ˈvɜ:tʃuəl] 虚拟的，实质上的（但未正式被承认） monopoly [mə'nɒp(ə)lɪ] 垄断 chemical compound ['kemɪk(ə)l]['kɒmpaʊnd] 化合物 interaction 互动 phenols, chlorine 酚，氯 mould 霉 The tiniest concentrations - as little as three or four parts to a trillion - can spoil the taste of the product contained in the botltle. tiniest 最 微小的(tiny) concentration 关注点 spoil 糟蹋，破坏，溺爱 The result has been a gradual yet steady move first towards plastic stoppers and, more recently, to aluminium screw caps. These substitutes are cheaper. gradual 逐渐的, graduate 毕业(的) yet 还，但是 steady 稳定 stable plastic 塑料(的) aluminium 铝的 screw n.螺旋，v.拧 cap 帽，盖 substitute 替代品 alternative n.替代的选择adj.交替的选择性的 alternation n.交替 classic 经典的 同classical，前者还有著作，后者有古典音乐之意 *Its traditional image is more in keeping with that of the type of high quality goods with which it has long been associated. traditional image 传统形象 in keeping with 符合 sustainable 可持续发展的 sustain 维持 biodiversity [,baɪə(ʊ)daɪ'vɜːsɪtɪ] 生物多样性 desertification 沙漠化 The future of this ancient material once again looks promising . promising 有希望的 reading-2 ¶ Collecting must be one of the most varied of human activities, and it's one that many of us psychologists find fascinating . the most varied (the 最高级)作名词性短语 psychologist [sai'kɔledʒist] 心理学家 fascinating ['fæsɪneɪtɪŋ] 迷人的 Many forms of collecting have been dignified with a technical name: an archtophilist collects teddy bears, a philatelist collects postage stamps, and a deltiologist collects postcards. dignify ['dɪgnɪfaɪ] 使高贵 amass [ə'mæs] 积累，accumulate this could be called an instrumental reason for collecting. instrumental 乐器的，器械的。但在这里表示 有帮助的 as a mean to an end 作为达到目的的手段 They'll look for antiques that they can buy cheaply and expect to be able to sell at a profit . antique [æn'tiːk] 古董 unique 唯一的 profit ['prɒfɪt] 利润，利益 buying cheap and selling dear cheap 和 cheaply都可作adv dear 在这里作昂贵的意思 give the collector a sense of triumph . triumph ['traɪʌmf] v.n. （取得）巨大胜利 This is a variant on joining a bridge club or a gym , and similarly brings them into contact with like-minded people. variant ['veərɪənt] 变体 gym 健身房，体育馆 like-minded 志趣相投的 spend their whole lives in a hunt for this. hunt [hʌnt] 寻找 Without those collections, our understanding would be greatly inferior to what it is. greatly inferior 相当地初级 to a lesser extent 在较小程度上。 to a certain extent在一定程度上 trainspotting 收集机车号码 locomotive [ləʊkə'məʊtɪv] 火车头 tick off 列举，标出 work out 得到，算出 As a byproduct , many practitioners of the hobby become very knowledgeable about railway operations, or the technical specifications of different engine types. byproduct 副产品 practitioner [præk'tɪʃ(ə)nə] 实践者 knowledgeable 有见识的 specification 规格 dolls 玩偶， 别看成dollar.. These have changed over the centuries from the wood that was standard in 16 th centurey Europe, through the wax and porcelain of later centuries, to the plastics of today dolls. over the centuries from ... through ... to ... wood 木材 wax [wæks] 蜡 porcelain ['pɔːs(ə)lɪn] 瓷。tile 瓷砖，瓦片 Collectors might be inspired to study how dolls reflect notions of what children like, or ought to like. inspire [ɪn'spaɪə] 激发，鼓舞 notion ['nəʊʃ(ə)n] 概念，见解 ought to do [ɔːt] 应该会 arrange their stamps in albums , ususally very neatly . arrange 安排 album 相簿 neatly 整洁地，灵巧地。neat adj. they depict birds vt. 描述 One reason, conscious or not, for what someone chooses to collect is to show the collector's individualism . conscious ['kɒnʃəs] 有意识的，神志清醒的 individual ism 个人主义 dog collar 狗脖套， collar衣领，项圈 there is ... in existence 存在 grow out of .. 因...发展起来 pleasure - pressure 快乐，希望 - 压力 passion n.激情 engross 使全神贯注 fulfilment [ful'filmənt] 成就。 reputation 名声（权游里面经常听哈哈） it may appear an eccentric . 他可能看起来是个古怪的人 collecting has a lot going for it has a lot going for it 具有很大优势 reading-3 ¶ I would found an institution where any person can find instruction in any subject. That was the founder's motto for Cornell University, and it seems an apt characterization of the different university. found [faʊnd] 建立。非过去时态 institution [ɪnstɪ'tjuːʃ(ə)n] 制度，机构 instruction [ɪn'strʌkʃ(ə)n] 指导 founder 创始人 motto 格言 apt [æpt] 恰当的 characterization 描述 resort management, interior design 旅游管理，室内设计 Arson for Profit . I kid you not : we have it on the books. Arson for Profit 纵火牟利 I kid you not 我不骗你 meet the academic requirements. 符合学术要求 The course is intended for prospective arson investigators , who can learn all the tricks of the trade for detecting whether a fire was deliberately set, discovering who did it, and establishing a chain of evidence for effective prosecution in a court of law. intend 打算，准备 prospective [prə'spektɪv] 未来的，预期的 investigator 研究者 trick 技巧 detect 察觉，探测 deliberately [dɪ'lɪbərətli] 故意的。后面的te会被吞音 prosecution [prɒsɪ'kjuːʃ(ə)n] 起诉 court [kɔːt] 法院 professionalization of this and many other occupations . professionalization 职业化。profession职业。 occupations 职业，行业 firefighter to torch a building firefighter 消防人员 torch 点燃 how dishonest and illegal behavior can creep into every aspect of public and business life. creep into 悄悄混进 anew adv. 重新 The regular instructor is a colleague who appreciates the kind of ethical perspective I can bring as a philosopher. regular instructor 普通教员 colleague ['kɒliːg] 同事 ethical perspective 伦理视角 I take my cue from the title of the course:'principles of marketing'. take my cue 得到暗示 After all , a subject matter can have principles in the sense of being codified , haveing rules, as with football or chess, without being principled in the sense of being ethical . 这一整句不太懂 After all 毕竟 codify 编成法典 ethical 伦理的。道德的 I made the suggestion, which may sound downright crazy in light of the evidence, that perhaps marketing is by definition principled. downright 完全地 in light of 根据，鉴于 My inspiration for this judgement is the philosopher Immanue Kant, who argued that any body of knowledge consists of an end and a means. inspiration [ˌɪnspəˈreɪʃn] 灵感。 inspire 激发 judgement ['dʒʌdʒm(ə)nt] 判断 consists of 包含 these need nor even concern the acquisition of marketing expertise as such. acquisition [,ækwɪ'zɪʃ(ə)n] 获得物 expertise [,ekspɜː'tiːz] 专业知识。expert 专家 hence 因此 deserve scrutiny 应受监管 It is at this point that ... 此时此刻, now That course is presumably all about means-, how to detect and prosecute criminal activity. presumably adv.想必是 prosecute ['prɒsɪkjuːt] 检举 criminal 犯罪的 crime 罪行 I ask fire science students to articulate the end. ask ... to ... 要求 xx 做 xx articulate [ɑ:'tɪkjʊleɪt] 明确表达 safety and welfare of society 社会 安全 和 福利 noble 高尚的 destructive [dɪ'strʌktɪv] 破坏性的 reckless ['reklɪs] 鲁莽的 reck v.顾虑 firefighting 消防 fraud [frɔːd] 欺诈. liar 骗子，说谎者 poisoner ['pɔɪzənɚ] 投毒者。poison vi.下毒，vt.使中毒 divergent 分歧的。divergency 发散（收敛convergency） murder v.n.谋杀 Test-6 ¶ listening-1 ¶ begins on the 16 ^{th} ^{th} of May and goes on till the 19 ^{th} ^{th} . programme & program 英式和美式 ceremony ['serɪmənɪ] 典礼，仪式 start at 2.45 and finish about 5.30 考试中貌似不能写2:45 to get a good spot n.地点，斑点。 v.弄脏 Most years we have a children's choir , but this year the local army cadets offered to perform. choir ['kwaɪə] 合唱队 cadet [kə'det] 学员 perform [pə'fɔːm] 执行，表演 we're celebrating her centenary . centenary [sen'tiːnərɪ; -'ten-] 百周年 century [ˈsentʃərɪ] 世纪 as the sun sets , there'll be a firework display. You should go to the park to watch, as you'll get the best view from there, and the display takes place on the opposite side of the river. sun set 日落 firework 烟火 ballet dancing ['bæleɪ; -lɪ] 芭蕾舞 demonstration [demən'streɪʃ(ə)n] 证明，示威游行 concert [ˈkɔnsət] 音乐会 presume && assume 意思基本一致。presume多用于基于概率的推测 listening-2 ¶ finalising plans for our tour. finalise ['faɪnəlaɪz] 使结束 He's already liaised with the managers of the theatres we're going to visit, and he's also arranged for an officer of the National Theatre in Munich to show us round the theatre one afternoon during our stay. liaise with [lɪ'eɪz] 和...建立联系 theatre ['θɪətə] 剧院，电影院 the precise cost precise [prɪ'saɪs] 精确的,clear。 concrete 具体的 negotiate [nɪ'gəʊʃɪeɪt] 商议 rehearsal [rɪ'hɜːs(ə)l] 排练 have a coach trip to one of the amazing castles in the mountains south of Munich. coach trip 巴士游。 coach n.教练，长途巴士，v.训练 castle ['kɑːs(ə)l] 城堡 I must confess that ... confess [kən'fes] 坦白 how she worked with the playwright . playwright ['pleɪraɪt] 剧作家 premiere ['premɪeə] 初次公演 dressy occasion 将就服装的场合 It was commissioned to mark a hundred years since the birth in the town of a well-known scientist. commission [kə'mɪʃ(ə)n] 委托 mark [mɑːk] 标记 We're going to see a revival of that production, which aroused a lot of interest. revival [rɪ'vaɪv(ə)l] 复兴 arouse [ə'raʊz] 唤醒，激发 pack clothes 穿衣服 garden of a palace 宫殿花园。 palace ['pælɪs] mayor and all the other dignitaries of the town mayor [ˈmeɪə] 市长 dignitary ['dɪgnɪt(ə)rɪ] 高官 the mayor is hosting a reception for all the audience . host a reception 主持招待会 audience 听众 date back to 追溯到。pursue 追
docs.title: C12

docs.text: I'd like to find out if you have any excursions suitable for families. excursion [ɪk'skɜːʃ(ə)n] 远足 suitable 这种后置修饰要注意别漏听 How about taking your family for a cruise ? We have a steamship that takes passengers out several times a day. cruise [kruːz] 巡游 steamship ['stiːmʃɪp] 轮船 passenger ['pæsɪndʒə] 旅客，这个在听力常见。 About an hour and a half. 这个听起来会很绕，注意这种时间的讲法。 fantastic 奇艺的，新奇的 there's a cafe or something on board . cafe 一般指小餐馆 on board 船上，火车上，飞机上 various 多种多样的，a variety of you are met off the boat by the farmer and he'll take you to the holding pens , where the sheep are kept . meet sb off the boat 接下船 holding pens 圈养 keep 饲养 there's also a 40-minute trek round the farm on a horse. trek 艰苦跋涉 round 跟all year round不同，这里应该是介词：绕 visitors are welcome to explore the farm on their own , as long as they take care to close gates and so on. on their own 任他们自己 as long as 只要 take care to do sth There are some very beautiful gardens along the side of the lake which also belong to the farm. along the side of 沿着xx的一面（边） what‘s the trail like in terms of difficulty? trail [treɪl] （注意读音）小径 in terms of 在...方面 work out 解决 It's just by the cruise ship terminal. by 附近，旁边 You'd also need to pick up a repair kit for the bike from there to take along with you, and you'd need to take along a snack and some water. repair kit 修理工具包 snack [snæk] 小吃，快餐。 Shaxian snack哈哈 I assume I can rent a helmet from the bike place. helmet ['helmɪt] 头盔 you should definitely get that. definitely ['defɪnɪtlɪ] 当然地。口语时省略读te, 就像definely what sort of prices are we looking at here? look at 这里是考虑之意

docs.text: they might get shouted at sometimes, but it's nothing personal. (没听懂的句子)虽然他们有时大喊大叫，但是这不是针对个人。 they're pleased that they have so many different things to do. pleased 高兴的 I'll tell you straightaway that .. straightaway 通俗易懂 straightforward you've all shown up on time. show up 露面，到场 I'm glad to see that ... glad 高兴的 the floor can get very wet and slippery . wet [wet] 湿的 slippery ['slɪp(ə)rɪ] 滑的。slip v.滑 Some of you'll need to remove your rings and bracelets . ring 戒指 bracelet [ˈbreɪslət] 手链 jewelry ['dʒuːəlrɪ] 珠宝 （题目粗线的） hazard ['hæzəd] 危险 regulation [regjʊ'leɪʃ(ə)n] 规则。 reputation 名声 There's some equipment you mustn't use until you've been properly trained, like the waste disposal system for example. equipment 设备 properly 适当地。proper适当的，appropriate 适当的 waste disposal system 废物处理系统 the meat sheer is out of bounds . meat sheer 至今不知道是啥，绞肉机？ out of bound 越界的 electric mixer 电动搅拌机。 electric 用电的 electrical 与电有关的 electronic 电子的 stressful 有压力的 plessure 愉快 pressure 压力 do overtime 加班 lifting and carrying 搬和运 but at least we do have a very efficient air conditioning system compared with some kitchens. efficient [ɪ'fɪʃ(ə)nt] 有效的（注意读音） air conditioning system 空调系统 If you injure yourself at all, even if it's really minor , you must report to him and he'll make sure the incident is recorded and you get the appropriate treatment . minor ['maɪnə] 较小的 incident 事件 appropriate[əˈprəʊprɪət;(for v.)əˈprəʊprɪeɪt] 适当地 treatment 治疗，处理，对待 smash a plate [smæʃ] 打碎盘子 the stores of perishable 易腐产品的贮藏 perish ['perɪʃ] 死亡，腐烂 flour or sugar 面粉 或 糖 flour ['flaʊə] 跟flower一样读音

docs.text: external development external [ɪk'stɜːn(ə)l; ek-] 外部的，表面的 local population 地方群体 the source of funding funding 资金 brainstorm a few ideas brainstorm ['breɪnstɔːm] 集思广益（头脑风暴） lots of books have been digitalised , people can access them from their own computers. If everyone did that, libraries would be obsolete . digitalise 使数字化 access ['ækses] 访问 obsolete ['ɒbsəliːt] adj.淘汰的， vt.淘汰 Digitalised books that are available online for free are mostly out of copyright . available [ə'veɪləb(ə)l] 可获得的 out of copyright 没有版权 up-to-date & out-of-date 最新的 & 过期的 evolve [ɪ'vɒlv] v.发展。evolution financial implication 涉及财政。implication 含义，牵连。 work out 又粗线了 we could interview some of the staff , and find out whether the library has its own budget . or if that's controlled by the local council . interview 采访 staff 职员 budget ['bʌdʒɪt] 预算 council ['kaʊns(ə)l; -sɪl] 委员会 facility for staff facility [fə'sɪləti] 设施。equipment measure v.n.测量 emergency exits 紧急出口 there's the question of the kind of insurance the library needs to have, in case anyone gets injured. in case 万一 they've got an archive of local newspapers going back years. archive ['ɑrkaɪv] 档案 going back years 前几年发行？ diary diary ['daɪərɪ] 日记。dairy ['deərɪ] 奶制品的 I quite fancy finding out what the differences ... fancy ['fænsɪ] v.喜爱，想象 adj.奇特的
docs.title: listening-3

docs.text: In public discussion of busness, we take certain values for granted . take sth for granted 认为...理所当然。grant v.同意，承认 collaboration [kəlæbə'reɪʃn] 合作 The trouble with these values. 使用with theoretical concept. 理论上的概念 pursue values by all means. pursue [pə'sjuː] 追求，从事 They can actually cause damage, which is not at all the intention . not at all 一点也不。不客气 intention [ɪn'tenʃ(ə)n] 意图 All too often the right thing backfires , if those leaders adopt values without understanding and managing the side effects that arise. The values can easily get in the way of what's actually intended. backfire 事与愿违 side effect 副作用 get in the way of 妨碍 get in xx's way On a anagement training course I once attended, once 曾经 The other teams tried to collaborate on building the structure, and descended into confusion , with everyone getting in each other's way . descend into confusion 陷入混乱 get in xx's way 妨碍 brilliantly ['briljəntli] 辉煌地 comply with the rule comply [kəm'plaɪ] 遵守，顺从 let // the person in the team with an aptitude for puzzles like this// build it alone. 注意断句let the person build it alone. with an aptitude for puzzles 有解谜题的天赋 In the case of a smartphone that a certain company launched, one director wanted to target the business market , and another demanded it was aimed at consumers. target 把目标放在 business market 企业市场 demand 要求 have his way 得逞 industriousness industrious [ɪn'dʌstrɪəs] 勤奋的 It's easy to mock people who say they work hard: after all , a hamster running around in a wheel is working hard - and getting nowhere. mock [mɒk] 嘲笑 after all 毕竟 hamster 仓鼠 wheel [wiːl] 车轮 the resources that companies value most. value vt. 重视 Here 'lazy' means having a rational determination not to carry out unnecessary tasks. rational ['ræʃ(ə)n(ə)l] 合理的 carry out 执行 这里的unnecessary 会听不怎么清un- they possess intellectual clarity , and they don't rush into making decisions. possess [pə'zes] 持有 clarity ['klærɪtɪ] 清晰 rush into 匆忙做。hurry up and [do sth] come up with 想出，提出 creat an attention-grabbing TV commercial . attention-grabbing 引人注目的。grab 抓走 commercial [kə'mɜːʃ(ə)l] 商业广告。adj.商业的，盈利的 plenty of 大量的 subsequent ['sʌbsɪkw(ə)nt] 随后的 derives pleasure from .. [dɪ'raɪv] 从xx得到快乐 profit ['prɒfɪt] 利润，利益 to solve a problem that the company has identified. 解决公司已经确认的问题 claim they "strive for excellence" 声称他们为卓越而奋斗 pioneer 先锋，拓荒者 market share 市场占有率
docs.title: listening-4

docs.text: Cork - the thick bark of the cork oal tree (Quercus suber) - is a remarkable material. Cork 软木。出现学名不懂也没办法 thick [θɪk] 厚的 bark [bɑːk] 树皮，毛皮 cork oal tree 软木橡树 remarkable [rɪ'mɑːkəb(ə)l] 卓越的，值得注意的。remark(评论) mark(标记) It is tough , elastic , buoyant , and fire-resistant , and suitable for a wide range of purposes. tough [tʌf] 坚韧的 elastic [ɪ'læstɪk] adj.有弹性的 n.橡皮圈 buoyant [ˈbɔɪənt] 轻快的 fire-resistant ['faɪə] [rɪ'zɪstənt] 抗火的 It has also been used for millennia : the ancient Egyptians sealed their sarcophagy (stone coffins ) with cork, while the ancient Greeks and Romans used it for anything from beehives to sandals . millennia [mɪˈleniə] 一千年 Egyptians [i:'dʒipʃənz] 埃及人 Greeks 希腊人 Romans 罗马人 seal [siːld] 封闭 coffins 棺材 beehive ['biːhaɪv] 蜂房 sandals ['sændlz] 凉鞋 And the cork oak itself is an extraordinary tree. extraordinary [ɪkˈstrɔːdənrɪ] 非凡的 Its bark grows up to 20 cm in thickness, insulating the tree like a coat wrapped around the trunk and branches and keeping the inside at a constant 20 ℃ all year round. insulate ['ɪnsjʊleɪt] 使绝缘 illustrate(说明) trunk 树干 Developed most probably as a defence against forest fires, the bar of the cork oak has a particular cellular structure - with about 40 million cells per cubic centimetre - that technology has never succeeded in replicating . 过去分词引导的句子做状语 most probably 很可能地 forest 森林 bar 棒，障碍 cellular 细胞的 centimetre ['sentɪmiːtə] 公分，厘米 (下下句里)millimetre ['mili,mi:tə] 毫米 replicate 复制 It also has an elasticity that means you can squash it and watch it spring back to its original size and shape when you release the pressure. squash 挤压 spring back 生长(spring有跳起、裂开的意思n/vi.vt) They flourish in warm, sunny climates where there is a minimum of 400 millimetres of rain per year. flourish ['flʌrɪʃ] 兴旺 climate [ˈklaɪmɪt] 气候 a minimum of 400 millimetres of rain Like grape vines , the trees thrive in poor soil , putting down deep roots in search of moisture and nutrients . grape vine 葡萄 藤 thrive [θraɪv] 兴旺，茁壮成长 (flourish) soil 土壤 moisture ['mɒɪstʃə] 水分 nutrient ['njuːtrɪənt] n.营养物，adj.营养的。nutritious有营养的，nutrition营养，营养学 in search of Today accounts for roughly half of all cork production around the world. ... are around 200 years old accounts for xx of xx 占比 around adv.大约，到处，在附近，prep.在周围 an exercise in patience 对耐心的锻炼 From the planting of a cork sapling to the first harvest takes 25 years, and a gap of approximately a decade must separate harvests from an individual tree. sapling ['sæplɪŋ] 树苗 harvest ['hɑːvɪst] 收获 separate (使)分开 If the bark is stripped on a day when it's too cold - or when the air is damp - the tree will be damaged. strip 脱去 damp 潮湿的 Cork harvesting is a very specialised profession . No mechanical means of stripping cork bark has been invented. specialised profession 特别的职业 mechanical means 机械手段 invent 发明 They make vertical cuts down the bark using small sharp axes , then lever it away in pieces as large as they can manage. vertical 垂直的 sharp axes 尖锐的斧头 lever 杠杆撬动 The most skilful cork-strippers prise away a semi-circular husk that runs the lenght of the trunk from just above ground level to the first branches. It is then dried on the ground. prise 撬动 (lever) semi-circular 半圆形的 husk [hʌsk] 皮，外壳 (bark) ground 地面 dry 使变干 It is boiled to kill any insects that might remain in the cork. boil 煮沸 insect ['ɪnsekt] 昆虫 Over 60% of cork then goes on to be made into traditional bottle stoppers , with most of the remainder being used in the construction trade. go on 继续 bottle stoppers 瓶塞 construction 建设 Corkboard and cork tiles are ideal for thermal and acoustic insulation, while granules of cork are used in the manufacture of concrete. tile 瓷砖 ideal 理想的 thermal ['θɜːm(ə)l] 热量的 acoustic [ə'kuːstɪk] 声学的 granules [grænju:ls] 颗粒 manufacture [mænjʊ'fæktʃə] 加工，制造 Recent years have seen the end of the virtual monopoly of cork as the material for bottle stoppers, due to concerns about the effect it may have on the contents of the bottle. This is caused by a chemical compound call 2,4,6-trichloroanisole (TCA), which forms through the interaction of plant phenols, chlorine and mould. virtual [ˈvɜ:tʃuəl] 虚拟的，实质上的（但未正式被承认） monopoly [mə'nɒp(ə)lɪ] 垄断 chemical compound ['kemɪk(ə)l]['kɒmpaʊnd] 化合物 interaction 互动 phenols, chlorine 酚，氯 mould 霉 The tiniest concentrations - as little as three or four parts to a trillion - can spoil the taste of the product contained in the botltle. tiniest 最 微小的(tiny) concentration 关注点 spoil 糟蹋，破坏，溺爱 The result has been a gradual yet steady move first towards plastic stoppers and, more recently, to aluminium screw caps. These substitutes are cheaper. gradual 逐渐的, graduate 毕业(的) yet 还，但是 steady 稳定 stable plastic 塑料(的) aluminium 铝的 screw n.螺旋，v.拧 cap 帽，盖 substitute 替代品 alternative n.替代的选择adj.交替的选择性的 alternation n.交替 classic 经典的 同classical，前者还有著作，后者有古典音乐之意 *Its traditional image is more in keeping with that of the type of high quality goods with which it has long been associated. traditional image 传统形象 in keeping with 符合 sustainable 可持续发展的 sustain 维持 biodiversity [,baɪə(ʊ)daɪ'vɜːsɪtɪ] 生物多样性 desertification 沙漠化 The future of this ancient material once again looks promising . promising 有希望的
docs.title: reading-1

docs.text: Collecting must be one of the most varied of human activities, and it's one that many of us psychologists find fascinating . the most varied (the 最高级)作名词性短语 psychologist [sai'kɔledʒist] 心理学家 fascinating ['fæsɪneɪtɪŋ] 迷人的 Many forms of collecting have been dignified with a technical name: an archtophilist collects teddy bears, a philatelist collects postage stamps, and a deltiologist collects postcards. dignify ['dɪgnɪfaɪ] 使高贵 amass [ə'mæs] 积累，accumulate this could be called an instrumental reason for collecting. instrumental 乐器的，器械的。但在这里表示 有帮助的 as a mean to an end 作为达到目的的手段 They'll look for antiques that they can buy cheaply and expect to be able to sell at a profit . antique [æn'tiːk] 古董 unique 唯一的 profit ['prɒfɪt] 利润，利益 buying cheap and selling dear cheap 和 cheaply都可作adv dear 在这里作昂贵的意思 give the collector a sense of triumph . triumph ['traɪʌmf] v.n. （取得）巨大胜利 This is a variant on joining a bridge club or a gym , and similarly brings them into contact with like-minded people. variant ['veərɪənt] 变体 gym 健身房，体育馆 like-minded 志趣相投的 spend their whole lives in a hunt for this. hunt [hʌnt] 寻找 Without those collections, our understanding would be greatly inferior to what it is. greatly inferior 相当地初级 to a lesser extent 在较小程度上。 to a certain extent在一定程度上 trainspotting 收集机车号码 locomotive [ləʊkə'məʊtɪv] 火车头 tick off 列举，标出 work out 得到，算出 As a byproduct , many practitioners of the hobby become very knowledgeable about railway operations, or the technical specifications of different engine types. byproduct 副产品 practitioner [præk'tɪʃ(ə)nə] 实践者 knowledgeable 有见识的 specification 规格 dolls 玩偶， 别看成dollar.. These have changed over the centuries from the wood that was standard in 16 th centurey Europe, through the wax and porcelain of later centuries, to the plastics of today dolls. over the centuries from ... through ... to ... wood 木材 wax [wæks] 蜡 porcelain ['pɔːs(ə)lɪn] 瓷。tile 瓷砖，瓦片 Collectors might be inspired to study how dolls reflect notions of what children like, or ought to like. inspire [ɪn'spaɪə] 激发，鼓舞 notion ['nəʊʃ(ə)n] 概念，见解 ought to do [ɔːt] 应该会 arrange their stamps in albums , ususally very neatly . arrange 安排 album 相簿 neatly 整洁地，灵巧地。neat adj. they depict birds vt. 描述 One reason, conscious or not, for what someone chooses to collect is to show the collector's individualism . conscious ['kɒnʃəs] 有意识的，神志清醒的 individual ism 个人主义 dog collar 狗脖套， collar衣领，项圈 there is ... in existence 存在 grow out of .. 因...发展起来 pleasure - pressure 快乐，希望 - 压力 passion n.激情 engross 使全神贯注 fulfilment [ful'filmənt] 成就。 reputation 名声（权游里面经常听哈哈） it may appear an eccentric . 他可能看起来是个古怪的人 collecting has a lot going for it has a lot going for it 具有很大优势
docs.title: reading-2

docs.text: I would found an institution where any person can find instruction in any subject. That was the founder's motto for Cornell University, and it seems an apt characterization of the different university. found [faʊnd] 建立。非过去时态 institution [ɪnstɪ'tjuːʃ(ə)n] 制度，机构 instruction [ɪn'strʌkʃ(ə)n] 指导 founder 创始人 motto 格言 apt [æpt] 恰当的 characterization 描述 resort management, interior design 旅游管理，室内设计 Arson for Profit . I kid you not : we have it on the books. Arson for Profit 纵火牟利 I kid you not 我不骗你 meet the academic requirements. 符合学术要求 The course is intended for prospective arson investigators , who can learn all the tricks of the trade for detecting whether a fire was deliberately set, discovering who did it, and establishing a chain of evidence for effective prosecution in a court of law. intend 打算，准备 prospective [prə'spektɪv] 未来的，预期的 investigator 研究者 trick 技巧 detect 察觉，探测 deliberately [dɪ'lɪbərətli] 故意的。后面的te会被吞音 prosecution [prɒsɪ'kjuːʃ(ə)n] 起诉 court [kɔːt] 法院 professionalization of this and many other occupations . professionalization 职业化。profession职业。 occupations 职业，行业 firefighter to torch a building firefighter 消防人员 torch 点燃 how dishonest and illegal behavior can creep into every aspect of public and business life. creep into 悄悄混进 anew adv. 重新 The regular instructor is a colleague who appreciates the kind of ethical perspective I can bring as a philosopher. regular instructor 普通教员 colleague ['kɒliːg] 同事 ethical perspective 伦理视角 I take my cue from the title of the course:'principles of marketing'. take my cue 得到暗示 After all , a subject matter can have principles in the sense of being codified , haveing rules, as with football or chess, without being principled in the sense of being ethical . 这一整句不太懂 After all 毕竟 codify 编成法典 ethical 伦理的。道德的 I made the suggestion, which may sound downright crazy in light of the evidence, that perhaps marketing is by definition principled. downright 完全地 in light of 根据，鉴于 My inspiration for this judgement is the philosopher Immanue Kant, who argued that any body of knowledge consists of an end and a means. inspiration [ˌɪnspəˈreɪʃn] 灵感。 inspire 激发 judgement ['dʒʌdʒm(ə)nt] 判断 consists of 包含 these need nor even concern the acquisition of marketing expertise as such. acquisition [,ækwɪ'zɪʃ(ə)n] 获得物 expertise [,ekspɜː'tiːz] 专业知识。expert 专家 hence 因此 deserve scrutiny 应受监管 It is at this point that ... 此时此刻, now That course is presumably all about means-, how to detect and prosecute criminal activity. presumably adv.想必是 prosecute ['prɒsɪkjuːt] 检举 criminal 犯罪的 crime 罪行 I ask fire science students to articulate the end. ask ... to ... 要求 xx 做 xx articulate [ɑ:'tɪkjʊleɪt] 明确表达 safety and welfare of society 社会 安全 和 福利 noble 高尚的 destructive [dɪ'strʌktɪv] 破坏性的 reckless ['reklɪs] 鲁莽的 reck v.顾虑 firefighting 消防 fraud [frɔːd] 欺诈. liar 骗子，说谎者 poisoner ['pɔɪzənɚ] 投毒者。poison vi.下毒，vt.使中毒 divergent 分歧的。divergency 发散（收敛convergency） murder v.n.谋杀

docs.text: begins on the 16 ^{th} ^{th} of May and goes on till the 19 ^{th} ^{th} . programme & program 英式和美式 ceremony ['serɪmənɪ] 典礼，仪式 start at 2.45 and finish about 5.30 考试中貌似不能写2:45 to get a good spot n.地点，斑点。 v.弄脏 Most years we have a children's choir , but this year the local army cadets offered to perform. choir ['kwaɪə] 合唱队 cadet [kə'det] 学员 perform [pə'fɔːm] 执行，表演 we're celebrating her centenary . centenary [sen'tiːnərɪ; -'ten-] 百周年 century [ˈsentʃərɪ] 世纪 as the sun sets , there'll be a firework display. You should go to the park to watch, as you'll get the best view from there, and the display takes place on the opposite side of the river. sun set 日落 firework 烟火 ballet dancing ['bæleɪ; -lɪ] 芭蕾舞 demonstration [demən'streɪʃ(ə)n] 证明，示威游行 concert [ˈkɔnsət] 音乐会 presume && assume 意思基本一致。presume多用于基于概率的推测

docs.text: finalising plans for our tour. finalise ['faɪnəlaɪz] 使结束 He's already liaised with the managers of the theatres we're going to visit, and he's also arranged for an officer of the National Theatre in Munich to show us round the theatre one afternoon during our stay. liaise with [lɪ'eɪz] 和...建立联系 theatre ['θɪətə] 剧院，电影院 the precise cost precise [prɪ'saɪs] 精确的,clear。 concrete 具体的 negotiate [nɪ'gəʊʃɪeɪt] 商议 rehearsal [rɪ'hɜːs(ə)l] 排练 have a coach trip to one of the amazing castles in the mountains south of Munich. coach trip 巴士游。 coach n.教练，长途巴士，v.训练 castle ['kɑːs(ə)l] 城堡 I must confess that ... confess [kən'fes] 坦白 how she worked with the playwright . playwright ['pleɪraɪt] 剧作家 premiere ['premɪeə] 初次公演 dressy occasion 将就服装的场合 It was commissioned to mark a hundred years since the birth in the town of a well-known scientist. commission [kə'mɪʃ(ə)n] 委托 mark [mɑːk] 标记 We're going to see a revival of that production, which aroused a lot of interest. revival [rɪ'vaɪv(ə)l] 复兴 arouse [ə'raʊz] 唤醒，激发 pack clothes 穿衣服 garden of a palace 宫殿花园。 palace ['pælɪs] mayor and all the other dignitaries of the town mayor [ˈmeɪə] 市长 dignitary ['dɪgnɪt(ə)rɪ] 高官 the mayor is hosting a reception for all the audience . host a reception 主持招待会 audience 听众 date back to 追溯到。pursue 追
